Html:
Hi,

I have a list of hundreds of points. I want to draw a polygon that contain all the points. Is there an easy way to generate that?
just create GMapPolygon and add it to your overlay

Sorry. I clearly sucked at explaining what I meant.

The points are scattered over an area and I only want to draw the polygon that connects the outer points.
mm, thats requires some calculations, never needed that

Hello ta,
